meanings.sent1: She is demineralizing the water to make it pure.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended demineralizing the teeth to prevent decay.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally ended up demineralizing the soup by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The harsh chemicals in the cleaning solution were slowly demineralizing the metal surface.
meanings.sent5: The scientist demonstrated how demineralizing the soil affected plant growth.

meanings.sent1: Demineralizing can lead to weaker bones over time.
meanings.sent2: The demineralizing of the rocks was evident in the laboratory analysis.
meanings.sent3: The demineralizing of the ocean water was causing concern among marine biologists.
meanings.sent4: The demineralizing of the body's tissues can impact overall health.
meanings.sent5: The gradual demineralizing of the tooth enamel was visible in the X-ray.
